alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 22 at 7:58PM EDT until June 22 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Georgia and central South Carolina, including the following areas, in east central Georgia, Columbia and Richmond. In central South Carolina, Aiken and Edgefield. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 758 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... North Augusta, Evans, Augusta, Martinez, Belvedere, Summerville, Augusta National Golf Club, Midtown, Daniel Field, Glendale, Augusta Mall, Village Plaza Shopping Center, Westover Memorial Park, Harrisburg, Pendleton King Park, Kroc Center, Forest Hills, West End Augusta, Minnick Park and Westwick. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 195 and 201. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 13. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
